title: FS: T206 HOFer 5 Card Lot (Low Grade)
author: Sterling Sports Auctions

posts.post_title: FS: T206 HOFer 5 Card Lot (Low Grade)
posts.post_content:
Up for sales 5 Card HOFer Lot.  Top row of scan,  Bender, Crawford, McGraw, Huggins, and Duffy.  Back scan is inverted, Duffy has Polar Bear back.  

All lower grade $200ppd (insurance optional at your expense).

[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=675&u=11817413][img]http://i61.servimg.com/u/f61/11/81/74/13/t2061510.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=http://www.servimg.com/image_preview.php?i=676&u=11817413][img]http://i61.servimg.com/u/f61/11/81/74/13/t2061511.jpg[/img][/url]

All other cards are sold.

Thanks 

Lee

Lowered the price again.

Thanks Lee
